scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --pad-prefix --prefix-colors red.bold,blue.bold --names Jekyll,Tailwind "cd src && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload" "npm run build:styles -- --watch"
scripts.dev:noreload: concurrently --kill-others --pad-prefix --prefix-colors red.bold,blue.bold --names Jekyll,Tailwind "cd src && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve" "npm run build:styles -- --watch"
scripts.build: npm run build:styles && cd src && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:production: npm run build:styles && cd src && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build && npm run zip
scripts.zip: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist && cd src/_site && bestzip ../../dist/site.zip *
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf src/.jekyll-cache src/_site src/.jekyll-metadata node_modules dist
